title: Senior Partner
email 1:
Hi Sorèl,

Unclear messaging turns good work into lost opportunities.

When communication falls short, your business spends more time fixing problems than creating value.

That lost productivity hits your profits hard.

We can help you lock in your proposition with a whiteboard video that does most of the talking.

Just for reading, I can send over a rough 10-second teaser if you like.

If it’s not a fit, reply NO and I’ll bow out.

Until next time,
– Trent,
Toon Theory
http://www.toontheory.com
email 2:
Hi there Sorèl,

Resending this in case it got lost

Here's the thing, most teams never track how much they lose repeating the same idea in different ways.

But those unbilled hours go somewhere — extra calls, another email there and one more useless meeting.

That’s why we condense the whole pitch into a whiteboard video you and your prospects can watch once and actually remember.

If you want, I’ll put together a short teaser just so you have it.

If it’s not for you, reply 'NO' and I’ll head out.

Best regards,
– Trent, Founder
Toon Theory
toontheory.com/
email 3:
Hello there Sorèl,

Before I close the loop, I wanted to send this one more time.

As I said before, unclear or vague requests create extra work, follow-ups, and revisions — none of which you can bill for, yet all cost real money and wasted effort.

Our whiteboard videos give you a clear, consistent narrative from the first hello all the way to the final close.

I can put together a small teaser if you’re curious — no need to reply.

Just something to keep if it’s helpful down the road.

Catch you later,
– Trent, Founder
Toon Theory
